meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a snake.
meanings.sent1: The garden hose looked snakiest as it twisted and turned on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The jungle is full of the snakiest vines that wind around trees.
meanings.sent3: The snakiest path through the maze led to a surprise at the end.
meanings.sent4: Her snakiest smile hid her true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The snakiest pattern on the fabric resembled a serpent's scales.

meanings.sent1: Among all the students, she was the snakiest in her pranks.
meanings.sent2: The spy was known for his snakiest tactics to gather information.
meanings.sent3: The snakiest player on the team always had a trick up their sleeve.
meanings.sent4: His snakiest move was pretending to be asleep to eavesdrop on the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The snakiest character in the story outwitted everyone with their cunning plans.
